text:
"A Generation" () is a 1955 Polish World War II drama movie. It was directed by Andrzej Wajda. It is based on the book "Pokolenie" by Bohdan Czeszko. Actors include Tadeusz Łomnicki, Urszula Modrzyńska, Tadeusz Janczar, Ryszard Kotys, and Roman Polanski.
This was the first movie of the "Three Wars" trilogy by director Andrzej Wajda. It was followed by "Kanal" and "Ashes and Diamonds".
